name: Eggsplosion (Gargantus)
description:
Made for ludum dare 48 

Eggsplosion is a platformer game where you move using only bombs as you go deeper and deeper into the caves. You're playing as a miner egg dude that gets hurt by touching the floor. Will you be able to reach the golden egg?

Controls:
A,D - Move
Left mouse button - Shoot
Right mouse button - Detonate
R - Restart

Credits:
Art and code done by me

Music done by HeatleyBros:
https://www.audiomicro.com/artist/heatleybros
